ABOUT US

Mvono Consultants is a wholly Kenyan owned consultancy firm involved in the management of safety, energy, plant systems and IT managed services.

The business was registered in 2009 in order to address the growing need for effective advisory services in the field of safety, plant and energy management. The business is managed by Engineer Donald M Mbogho who carries with him over 29 years of experience in plant management, statutory inspection (pressure vessels, lifting equipment, refrigeration plant), energy management and safety advisory.

    Our Mission

  • To be the preferred consultants in the provision of industry solution in safety, energy and plant management.
  • To effectively provide our customers with excellent services and support
  • To have a long term, mutually beneficial relationships with our customers, employees, suppliers and the broader environment
